marketNews.title: ðŸ’¸ AADI: ARA on Listing Day, PUPS Exercised starting December 6
marketNews.content:
Adaro Andalan Indonesia ($AADI) officially listed on the IDX today, Thursday (5/12). Amidst the buzz regarding short-term trading opportunities from AADI's IPO, we assess that investors can also consider fundamental factors for long-term investment in AADI, especially regarding dividend yield. 
- Valuation has potential for Re-rating to 5-7x P/E. We estimate AADI's net profit in FY25F will decrease to the level of USD 934 million (-27.5% YoY) due to the loss of one-off gain from subsidiary sales, with core profit only decreasing by -3.2% YoY. However, considering its low IPO valuation (2.9x P/E FY25F), we see AADI having quite high upside potential with a re-rating opportunity to 5x P/E FY25F (9,650 rupiah per share, +74% from the IPO price). We consider the valuation of AADI at 5x P/E as reasonable and conservative because it is lower than the 5-year historical average P/E of its parent company, Alamtri Resources Indonesia ($ADRO), at 6.9x P/E. This valuation is also between Bukit Asam ($PTBA) at 7.3x P/E FY25F and Indo Tambangraya Megah ($ITMG) at 4.8x P/E FY25F. If AADI can re-rate to ADRO's 5-year historical average P/E (6.9x) and become similar to PTBA's valuation at ~7x PE, this implies a price of 13,525 rupiah per share (+144% from the IPO price).
- Dividend Yield up to ~17% with 50% DPR Assumption. Besides the outlook for Newcastle coal prices which we expect will not significantly decrease, we see AADI's potential for re-rating will also be driven by prospects for the 2025 fiscal year dividend, which we estimate can reach ~966 rupiah per share. This amount indicates a dividend yield of approximately 17% based on AADI's IPO share price (5,550 rupiah per share). This dividend size assumes a dividend payout ratio (DPR) of 50%, which is the average DPR of ADRO over the last 3 years. This dividend yield is higher compared to other major coal companies, such as ITMG and PTBA. Although management stated in the prospectus that they plan to distribute dividends with a DPR of up to 45%, we consider the assumption of a 50% DPR not to be aggressive considering the company currently has no major capex plans in the near future. With a 50% DPR and the level of annual net profit generated by the company, we also assess that AADI still has adequate funds if at any time it decides to develop its 2 coal mines, namely Pari Coal and Ratah Coal.
- Main Assumptions in Our Analysis:
  - Average Newcastle coal price of USD 135 per ton in 2024 and USD 130 per ton in 2025, reflecting normalization from the current level of USD 134.8 per ton.
  - Sales volume of 63 million tons in 2024 (-0.6% YoY) and 64 million tons in 2025 (+1.6% YoY).
  - Cash costs of USD 56.2 per ton in 2024 (-12% YoY) and USD 57.8 per ton in 2025 (+2.9% YoY).
  - Non-operating income decreased significantly in 2025 (-89.4% YoY) along with the loss of one-off gain from the disposal of investment assets.
Key Takeaway: Although it seems many investors bought AADI based on short-term trading opportunities, we see AADI can be a good fundamental investment opportunity, especially with a relatively stable coal outlook and significant, routine dividend yield. Starting Friday (6/12) until Tuesday (10/12) at 10:00 AM WIB, investors who have the right to exercise AADI's PUPS ([$ADRO-H](-H)) can perform the exercise on the Stockbit application. Dividends eligible for exercising ADRO-H will be credited on Friday (6/12).
With AADI's increase of +19.8% to the level of 6,650 rupiah per share today (5/12), the exercise price is 5,971 rupiah per share (including the 0.18% transaction fee imposed based on the PUPS prospectus).
Here is how to exercise ADRO-H on Stockbit:
1. Swipe right on ADRO-H on the Portfolio page, then click Exercise.
2. Enter the amount of ADRO-H you want to exercise. Then click Exercise.

marketNews.title: Head of the Fed, Jerome Powell, stated that the US economy is currently stronger than the Fed's projections when starting interest rate cuts in September 2024
marketNews.content: Head of the Fed, Jerome Powell, said on Wednesday (4/12) that the US economy is currently stronger than the Fed's projections when starting to cut interest rates in September 2024. Powell also stated that the current US economic conditions make the Fed slightly more cautious in finding the neutral interest rate level, which is a signal that the Fed will likely slow down the pace of interest rate cuts going forward.

marketNews.title: President Prabowo Subianto stated that he received a threat that the IHSG would fall if he continued the free nutritious meal program
marketNews.content: President Prabowo Subianto said on Wednesday (4/12) that he received a threat that the IHSG would fall if he continued the free nutritious meal program, although he did not specify who made this threat. President Prabowo also stated that he was unconcerned by the threat because he owns no shares.

marketNews.title: BEI Director, Irvan Susandy, stated that the exchange will implement a non-cancellation period during the pre-opening and pre-closing sessions of stock trading.
marketNews.content: BEI Director, Irvan Susandy, said that the exchange will implement a non-cancellation period during the pre-opening and pre-closing sessions of stock trading. This policy will start applying in 2025, although Irvan did not specify the exact date. The non-cancellation period is a period where investors cannot cancel or change open orders, but can still enter new orders. This step is aimed at minimizing price manipulation and buy-sell order manipulation (spoofing) during the pre-opening and pre-closing stock trading sessions.

marketNews.title: Bitcoin Price Surpassed $100,000 for the First Time on Thursday (5/12), Marking an All-Time High
marketNews.content: The price of Bitcoin surpassed $100,000 for the first time on Thursday (5/12), marking an all-time high. The price of Bitcoin has surged in recent weeks, driven by market expectations that the elected US president, Donald Trump, will implement looser regulations and policies that support crypto assets.

marketNews.title: Finance Minister, Sri Mulyani, released Finance Minister Regulation No. 88/2024 which allows budget surpluses exceeding the State Budget (APBN) to be a source of loans for State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN), Regionally-Owned Enterprises (BUMD), local governments, and other legal entities assigned by the government.
marketNews.content: Finance Minister, Sri Mulyani, released Finance Minister Regulation No. 88/2024 which allows budget surpluses exceeding the State Budget (APBN) to be a source of loans for State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN), Regionally-Owned Enterprises (BUMD), local governments, and other legal entities assigned by the government. These loans can only have a maximum duration of 90 calendar days and are intended to support debtor liquidity. Subsequently, the loans provided will use the Rupiah currency and are an uncommitted credit line. Responding to this new regulation, economist from Bright Institute, Awalil Rizky, stated that the ease of this loan facility has the potential to cause misuse by bureaucratic elements, so the government needs to create reports regarding the internal control system.

marketNews.title: PT Freeport Indonesia Spokesperson, Katri Krisnati, stated that operations at the copper smelter in JIIPE, East Java, are targeted to start increasing in 3Q25 after being halted due to a fire in October 2024.
marketNews.content: Spokesperson for PT Freeport Indonesia, Katri Krisnati, said on Wednesday (4/12) that they are targeting the operation of the copper smelter in JIIPE, East Java, to start increasing in 3Q25 after being halted due to a fire in October 2024. In a separate occasion, the President Director of MIND ID, Hendi Prio Santoso, stated on Wednesday (4/12) that they hope the smelter can operate normally within the next 6 months. Operational problems at the smelter plant prompted PT Freeport Indonesia to ask the government to extend its copper concentrate export permit, which is set to expire at the end of this year.

tickerNews.title: BUMI Targets Coal Production of 80 Million Tons in 2025
tickerNews.content: $BUMI: [Kontan](https://investasi.kontan.co.id/news/bumi-resourcers-bumi-optimistis-produksi-batubara-capai-80-juta-ton-di-tahun-2025) reported that Bumi Resources targets a coal production volume of around 80 million tons during 2025, which is higher by +2.6-5.3% compared to the projected production volume during 2024 at 76-78 million tons. BUMI itself [recorded](https://emitten-announcement.stockbit.com/attachments/f-31805526-0_BUMI_Laporan_Informasi_dan_Fakta_Material_31805526_lamp2.pdf) a coal production volume of 57.3 million tons (+2% YoY) during 9M24, with a sales volume of 55.8 million tons (+2.8% YoY). In a separate opportunity, BUMI also [plans](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/c628f14583_1392f4794d.pdf) to hold a private placement of approximately 16.1 million shares on December 11, 2024, to execute the conversion of mandatory convertible bonds, although the implementation price has not yet been announced.

tickerNews.title: PANI: PIK 2 Property Development Proceeds According to Plan, Unaffected by Tropical Coastland PSN Polemic
tickerNews.content: $PANI: Corporate Secretary of Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua, Christy Grassela, [said](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/12/05) that the development of the property project in PIK 2 continues according to plan and is not affected by the polemic regarding the status of the Tropical Coastland National Strategic Project (PSN) which is part of the PIK 2 development plan. Previously, the Minister of Agrarian Affairs and Spatial Planning/Head of the National Land Agency, Nusron Wahid, stated that President Prabowo Subianto would review the determination of this PSN status. This week, the Secretary of the Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs, Susiwijono Moegiarso, [mentioned](https://snips.stockbit.com/snips-terbaru/-opec-akan-kembali-tunda-rencana-peningkatan-produksi#:~:text=Sekretaris%C2%A0Kementerian,hal%20tersebut.) that his team would facilitate discussions between the government and PANI to discuss this matter.

tickerNews.title: MEDC: Medco Energi Internasional Plans to Issue Bonds Worth IDR 2.5 Trillion
tickerNews.content: $MEDC: Medco Energi Internasional plans to issue bonds worth IDR 2.5 trillion, with the proceeds intended for refinancing previous bonds and paying down part of the loan to its subsidiary. The bonds consist of Series A worth approximately IDR 1.7 trillion (7.75% interest and 5-year tenor) and Series B worth IDR 825 billion (8.25% interest and 7-year tenor). The public offering period is scheduled from December 27, 2024, to January 2, 2025. [These bonds](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/07a7819b07_72dc8f5497.pdf) have received an idAA- rating from Pefindo.

tickerNews.title: MTEL: Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Will Acquire 8,101 KM of Fiber Optic Network from PT Ultra Mandiri Telekomunikasi
tickerNews.content: $MTEL: [Bisnis](https://market.bisnis.com/read/20241204/192/1821639/akuisisi-aset-ptpp-jaringan-fiber-optik-mitratel-mtel-bertambah-8101-km) reported that Dayamitra Telekomunikasi will gain an additional 8,101 km of fiber optic network and 12,524 km of billable length from the acquisition of PT Ultra Mandiri Telekomunikasi. Consequently, MTEL's total fiber optic network increases from 39,714 km to over 47,800 km. Previously, MTEL had acquired 99.3% of the shares in PT Ultra Mandiri Telekomunikasi worth approximately IDR 645.5 billion, which was entirely a divestment from PT PP ($PTPP). The President Director of MTEL, Theodorus Ardi Hartoko, stated that the company will continue to expand selectively, not only in the tower business but also in fiber optics and other supporting services.

tickerNews.title: SRAJ: BCCS Maverick (A) I LP to Take Up USD 32 Million in New Shares Issuance as Part of Private Placement Plan
tickerNews.content: $SRAJ: Sejahteraraya Anugrahjaya [announced](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/7b0aaf2d09_412ee1ef67.pdf) that BCCS Maverick (A) I LP will take a portion worth USD 32 million in SRAJ's new share issuance. The purchase price has not been announced, while this transaction is part of the plan for a private placement of up to 1.2 billion (10%) shares which was approved in the Independent GMS in August 2024. In addition, SRAJ also announced that BCSS Maverick Holdings I LP, BCSS Maverick Holdings II LP, and BCCS Maverick (A) I LP will purchase the company's debt with a principal amount of USD 125 million. These three entities are affiliated entities of Bain Capital Credit LP, a US private investment firm.

tickerNews.title: DUTI: Duta Pertiwi to Distribute Interim Dividend for FY2024 of IDR 703 Billion or IDR 380 per Share
tickerNews.content: $DUTI: Duta Pertiwi will [distribute](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/ac98509128_e92b470cc7.pdf) an interim dividend for the 2024 fiscal year amounting to IDR 703 billion or IDR 380 per share. The cum date on the regular and negotiation market is December 12, 2024, with payment on December 23, 2024. Referring to DUTI's share price on Thursday (5/12) at the level of 4,400 rupiah per share, the indicative dividend yield is 8.6%.

tickerNews.title: HERO: Hero Supermarket Shareholders Approve Name Change to DFI Retail Nusantara
tickerNews.content: $HERO: Hero Supermarket shareholders approved the change of the company name to DFI Retail Nusantara on Wednesday (4/12). The President Director of HERO, Hadrianus Wahyu Trikusumo, [stated](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/12/05) that the name change was carried out because HERO had divested the Hero Supermarket business segment to an affiliated party, PT Hero Ritel Nusantara, at the end of June 2024. Going forward, Hadrianus mentioned that HERO will focus on the beauty and health product retail segment through Guardian, as well as the household product segment through IKEA. Nevertheless, Hadrianus did not specify capex allocation or store addition targets for 2025. As of November 2024, HERO has 340 Guardian stores.

tickerNews.title: BJBR: Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten Plans to Issue Bonds Worth IDR 1 Trillion
tickerNews.content: Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten ($BJBR) plans to issue bonds worth IDR 1 trillion, with the proceeds intended for financing disbursement. The bonds consist of Series A worth IDR 200 billion (7% interest and 3-year tenor) and Series B worth IDR 800 billion (7.3% interest and 5-year tenor). The public offering period is scheduled from December 3-5, 2024. [These bonds](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/43d54198c6_178da239a5.pdf) have received an idAA rating from Pefindo.

tickerNews.title: BNBR: Bakrie & Brothers Plans Private Placement of ~13.4 Billion Shares at IDR 64 per Share on December 10, 2024, for Mandatory Convertible Bond Conversion
tickerNews.content: Bakrie & Brothers ($BNBR) [plans](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202412/50b2438e99_9e484b744e.pdf) to conduct a private placement of approximately 13.4 billion shares at a price of 64 rupiah per share on December 10, 2024, to execute the conversion of mandatory convertible bonds. All new shares will be taken up by Eurofa Capital Investment Inc. and Silvery Moon Investment Ltd., which are not affiliated parties of the company.
